data.lyric:
[ti:The Wrong Things]
[ar:王源]
[al:The Wrong Things]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]The Wrong Things - 王源
[00:00.07]词：Justin Gray/Nikki Flores/Alex Freund
[00:00.14]曲：Justin Gray/Nikki Flores/Alex Freund
[00:00.21]编曲：Justin Gray
[00:00.28]制作人：Justin Gray
[00:00.35]混音：Justin Gray
[00:00.42]母带：Michelle Mancini
[00:00.49]和声：潘高峰
[00:00.56]监唱：黄少锋
[00:00.63]录音师：李游/李杨
[00:00.70]No it wasn't meant to be
[00:03.11]But all the words you said to me are still so clear
[00:10.75]Sometimes my mind plays tricks on me
[00:13.50]And I pretend that I can see you laying here
[00:21.27]If I'm supposed to heal in time
[00:24.18]Should you still be on my mind like you are
[00:31.65]Cuz I've been living with the fear
[00:34.40]That this pain won't disappear from my heart
[00:42.06]Sometimes the wrong things feel so right
[00:47.14]Sometimes the lights shine brighter at night
[00:52.59]Sometimes the truth's a lie
[00:57.75]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[01:03.09]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[01:11.07]It's impossible to quit
[01:13.32]When every thought of you's a hit that keeps me high
[01:21.53]All the memories make me numb
[01:23.68]But they're barely just enough to get me by
[01:31.69]You know I wonder all the time
[01:34.59]If I occupy your mind at all
[01:42.36]I'm embarrassed to confess
[01:45.43]I'm not strong enough to let you go
[01:52.52]Sometimes the wrong things feel so right
[01:57.75]Sometimes the lights shine brighter at night
[02:02.86]Sometimes the truth's a lie
[02:08.21]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[02:13.46]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[02:37.24]I'm embarrassed to confess
[02:40.16]I'm not strong enough to let you go
[02:45.45]The wrong things feel so right
[02:49.82]Sometimes the lights shine brighter at night
[02:55.34]Sometimes the truth's a lie
[03:00.60]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[03:05.65]So when you ask me how I am I say fine
[03:11.12]Won't you please ask me how I am
[03:16.42]So I would like to say I am fine
data.trans:
[ti:The Wrong Things]
[ar:王源]
[al:The Wrong Things]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.07]//
[00:00.14]//
[00:00.21]//
[00:00.28]//
[00:00.35]//
[00:00.42]//
[00:00.49]//
[00:00.56]//
[00:00.63]//
[00:00.70]不 这并不是命中注定
[00:03.11]但你对我说的每一个字都依然那么清晰
[00:10.75]时而被大脑蒙蔽
[00:13.50]幻想着你依旧躺在我身边
[00:21.27]若时光治愈了伤口
[00:24.18]你是否还会萦绕心间
[00:31.65]因为一直以来我都与恐惧相伴
[00:34.40]这心痛从未消散
[00:42.06]时而，错事让人沉醉
[00:47.14]时而，夜里的光芒更加耀眼
[00:52.59]时而，真相亦是谎言
[00:57.75]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[01:03.09]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[01:11.07]无从放弃
[01:13.32]念及你 仿佛电流击过 让我心悸
[01:21.53]过往回忆令我麻木
[01:23.68]零星片段伴我勉强度日
[01:31.69]你知道我一直很困惑
[01:34.59]我可曾占据过你的心
[01:42.36]窘迫使然无奈承认
[01:45.43]我还未及强大坦然释怀
[01:52.52]时而，错事让人沉醉
[01:57.75]时而，夜里的光芒更加耀眼
[02:02.86]时而，真相亦是谎言
[02:08.21]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[02:13.46]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[02:37.24]窘迫使然无奈承认
[02:40.16]我还未及强大坦然释怀
[02:45.45]时而，错事让人沉醉
[02:49.82]时而，夜里的光芒更加耀眼
[02:55.34]时而，真相亦是谎言
[03:00.60]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[03:05.65]所以当你轻语 我近来可好 我说无恙
[03:11.12]但求你，对我轻语
[03:16.42]我会告诉你，无恙
